meanings.definition: A musical instrument consisting of a set of wooden bars graduated in length to sound the notes of the scale.
meanings.sent1: The balafons produced beautiful melodies at the concert.
meanings.sent2: She learned to play the balafons in music class.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to play the balafons with its tail.
meanings.sent4: The sound of the balafons echoed through the forest like a gentle breeze.
meanings.sent5: The children were mesmerized by the enchanting sound of the balafons.

meanings.definition: A West African xylophone with resonators beneath each bar.
meanings.sent1: The traditional music featured the rhythmic beats of the balafons.
meanings.sent2: The musician skillfully played the balafons during the festival.
meanings.sent3: The balafons seemed to dance on their own in the moonlight.
meanings.sent4: The balafons' notes intertwined like a colorful tapestry of sound.
meanings.sent5: The village resonated with the vibrant tones of the balafons.
